posts.message:
بدور علي 
Virtual Paint library 
بترفع صوره او تصور صوره وتخليك قادر تحدد اجزاء من الصوره وتلونها 
زي http://colouradvisor.jotun.com/countrys/me/
انا دورت قبل ماكتب البوست وغالبا بدور ب key words غلط عشان كده ماوصلتش لحاجه 
شكرا علي مساعدتكم مقدما 
الintegration هيكون مع mobile app & web app 
بالنسبه للويب شغالين عليه php بالنسبه للموبايل اب شغالين عليه cross 
ممكن التكنولوجي تتغير مش مشكله علي حسب ترشحيات ال api

posts.message:
For me, it is really weird behavior need to be changed 
assuming that hosting environment is load-balancer-free is not the right assumption, asp.net mvc should be cloud-ready by default 

I should not spend much time before figuring out that asp.net mvc can't see the giant thing in front of it, so called load-balancer

posts.description: if a use RequireHttps in a controller class: [RequireHttps(Order = int.MinValue)] [Authorize] [Route("[action]")] public class XXXController if i remove RequireHttpsAttribute, it will work well....

posts.message:
عشان تشغل الواتساب ع البراوسر لازم يكون شغال ع الموبايل في نفس الوقت .
محتاج اشغل واتساب رقم الشركة على الكومبيوتر بحيث يبقى اسهل الرد ع السابورت ، فهل في طريقة لتشغيله دايركت من غير ملازم بكون شغال ع الموبايل ساعتها ؟ او تشغيل السيم كارد دايركت ع الكومبيوتر ؟

SA,
I'm having a serious problem guys.
I developed a big system (took me 1 month of full time development) using JavaFX.

Today the client decided that she wants it as a web page.

I've tried all day to embed the JavaFX app in the browser using webstarts and it's an epic fail.
Expensive certifications are needed (self signing doesn't work) 
PLUS Google Chrome doesn't support java anymore for security issues.

Any suggestions? If the only solution is to keep the models and database, and rewrite the controllers and views; What is the easiest Java web framework to re-implement the system?

Thanks in advance.

posts.description:
We're looking for Creative and talented UI & UX designer for web and mobile applications. (part-time OR full-time).

He'll be responsible for designing highly usable "web and mobile" based user interfaces that deliver a great user experience.

- Qualifications:
* Must have min. 2 years of experience.
* Very good understanding of Mobile-Apps user experience for both Android and IOS.
* A team player who can also work independently with minimal supervision.
* Portfolio, website, behance or dribble account available for review.

- Very good salaries for Creative and talented candidates.

- Any one interested kindly send your updated CV. and portfolio to: 
info@roqay.com
Good luck.

posts.message:
What do you guys think of certbot (Let's encrypt)? I used it and got my green https lock in 5 minutes for free. I mean it's one of those things that are too good to be true :-D
Do you think there's a catch or is the era of expensive ssl certificates is just over?
